response.original_title: Silvio Modesto, Confidencias De Um Sambista
response.overview: Silvio Modesto: Confessions of a Samba Musician is an emotional documentary that celebrates the life and work of one of Brazil's greatest samba icons. Led by the creative vision of Andr√© Salerno and Lucas Fazzio, the film honors Silvio Modesto, a musician, singer, composer, and producer, whose songs have left a mark on generations and were performed by legends such as Beth Carvalho, Bezerra da Silva, and Zeca Pagodinho.
response.title: Silvio Modesto, Confidencias De Um Sambista
